author: schneiml
body:
This PR is #15986 + #16148 .
- #15986 moves the new FPIX into the place of the old one, and removes remainders of the old one. This includes deleting some ancient geometries that used the old FPIX. See discussion there. (Rebased to CMSSW_8_1_X_2016-10-07-2300 to ease testing.)
- #16148 updates the FPIX xml files that were moved around above, leading to conflicts. I cherry-picked the single commit here and fixed the conflicts, this seems to be the easiest way.
#15986 can still be disputed; in that case only #16148 should be merged. But if we want both changes in, this is the PR to use.

(also @tmulholland , @veszpv , @friccita )
title: Remove old FPIX; make New FPIX default, and update FPIX materials
